markdownRemark.html:
Consumer Prices

All of the prices include the value added tax according to the general VAT rate of 24 %.

Server and damoin: 13.50 €/mth (server: 10.50 €/mth; domain: 3.00 €/mth)

Hourly Rates for Additional Work

Programming work: 15.00 €/h

Content management work: 15.00 €/h

Content creation work: 15.00 €/h

Other work: 15.00 €/h

Additional Fees

Paper invoice: 2.00 €/invoice

Invoice reminder: 2.00 €/reminder

Invoice note: 3.00 €/note (in addition to the collection fees of the reminder)
